attributes.action: Stop bank cash withdrawal limits for over 65’s
attributes.additional_details: Another Nanny state example of this woke and totally incompetent government administration
attributes.background: This is definitely not to save us old fuddy dudes from being scammed but so as we cannot do what we wish with our own money without the government knowing

rejection.details:
The Financial Conduct Authority have confirmed that no policy to introduce a limit on cash withdrawals for people aged over 65 has been introduced.

There have been no government announcements or credible media reports about any such age-related policy, nor could we find press releases from financial bodies, or high street banks.
